definition: festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
Youth Day (May 4th), PRC national holiday for young people aged 14 to 28, who get half a day off

sentences.english: What did Mary do on Youth Day?
sentences.chinese: 䧥瑪麗在青年節做了什麼事？

sentences.english: The Chinese Youth Day commemorates the May 4th Movement thar happened in 1919.
sentences.chinese: 中國青年節是紀念1919年發生的五四運動的日子。

sentences.english: Folk happy when lunar new year's season jubilation makes the eight-treasure rice pudding edible.
sentences.chinese: 民間喜在年節喜慶時做成八河北有哪些特產寶飯食用。

sentences.english: The festival is the populace entertainment festival.
sentences.chinese: 年節更是民衆娛樂狂歡的節日。

sentences.english: This is the best way to exude confidence and make sales.
sentences.chinese: 這就是最好的信心，使年節銷售。

sentences.english: On Youth Day, I joined the League. (
The festival was held by the Dong people to celebrate the harvest, according to the local media.
sentences.chinese: 當地媒體報導，侗年節是爲了慶祝豐收。

sentences.english: Three coaches flung off the tracks by the force of the impact alone;
sentences.chinese: 僅只受撞擊的影響，就有五月節中秋年節車箱出軌。

sentences.english: What did you do on Youth Day?
sentences.chinese: 你在青年節做了什麼事？

sentences.english: Wen encourages Chinese youths on Youth Day eve.
sentences.chinese: 溫家寶在五四青年節前夕鼓勵學生奮發向上。

sentences.english: It is Youth Day. Wish all the young people good luck.
sentences.chinese: 今天是五四青年節，祝青年朋友們好運。

sentences.english: Do you know the story of "Youth Day"?
sentences.chinese: 你知道五四青年節的由來嗎？

sentences.english: Because it's also known now as Youth Day. So you see.
sentences.chinese: 因爲這個節日還被稱爲是青年節，所以你明白了。

sentences.english: What did Marry do on Youth Day?
sentences.chinese: 青年節瑪麗做了什麼事情？

sentences.english: If there is a Five-day Internation Youth Festival, are you interested to join?
sentences.chinese: 假若有一個五天的國際青年節，你會否參加？
